title: Software Engineer, iOS
description: Develop and maintain applications for Apple's iOS platform.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in iOS development
responsibilities: Design and implement new features for iOS apps
Collaborate with design and product teams

title: Product Manager, Apple Watch
description: Lead the product strategy and roadmap for Apple Watch features and experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
5+ years of experience in product management
Experience with wearable technology or health products
responsibilities: Define product vision and strategy for Apple Watch
Work with engineering and design to deliver new features
Analyze market trends and customer feedback

title: Machine Learning Engineer, Siri
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models to improve Siri's intelligence and capabilities.
requirements: Master's or PhD in CS, AI, or related field
3+ years of experience in machine learning engineering
Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks
responsibilities: Design and implement ML models for natural language understanding
Collaborate with research and product teams

title: Hardware Engineer, iPhone
description: Design and develop hardware components for future iPhone models.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering
5+ years of experience in hardware design
responsibilities: Work with suppliers and manufacturing partners

title: Software Engineer, macOS
description: Contribute to the development of the macOS operating system and applications.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in macOS or desktop application development
Proficiency in C++, Objective-C, or Swift
responsibilities: Design and implement new features for macOS
